description: This is a React/Next.js page component for displaying and editing a note, including fetching note data, editing, saving, deleting, and displaying notifications.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static parameters for pre-rendering; returns an empty array indicating no static pages are pre-generated.

methods.name: NoteDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the note detail view, handling loading, fetch, edit, and delete actions.
